Title: An analogue investigation into the effect of trauma-related rumination on trauma intrusions and the moderating role of trait rumination and depression
Author: Kubota, Rie; Nixon, Reginald D. V.
TimeOfMeasurement: Same day post trauma film (after manipulation)
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of intrusion frequency (AFTER MANIPULATION)

Title: An analogue investigation into the effect of trauma-related rumination on trauma intrusions and the moderating role of trait rumination and depression
Author: Kubota, Rie; Nixon, Reginald D. V.
TimeOfMeasurement: Same day post trauma film (after reminder)
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of intrusion frequency (AFTER REMINDER)

Journal: Journal Of Behavior Therapy And Experimental Psychiatry
Title: The effects of rumination on mood and intrusive memories after exposure to traumatic material: an experimental study
Author: Zetsche, Ulrike; Ehring, Thomas; Ehlers, Anke
Step2_Individual_technique: Film-related rumination vs. Autobiographical memory elaboration
ResultSummary: No group difference on spontaneuous lab intruision  between rumination and memory integration group
